executable.title: MONAILabel Annotations
executable.acknowledgements: This work is part of the HistomicsTK/MONAILabel project.

image.name: inputImageFile
image.label: Input Image
image.description: Input image in which to count and classify positive pixels

region.name: analysis_roi
region.label: Analysis ROI
region.description: Region of interest within which the analysis should be done. Must be a four element vector in the format "left, top, width, height" in the space of the base layer. Default value of "-1, -1, -1, -1" indicates that the whole image should be processed.

string.name: server
string.label: MONAILabel Address
string.description: Address of a monailabel address in the format 'http://127.0.0.1:8000/'.

float.name: min_poly_area
float.label: Min Polygon Area
float.description: Filter Polygons based on min area size

boolean.name: send_image
boolean.label: Send Image Data
boolean.description: Send Raw Image Numpy to Server (slow)

double.name: analysis_mag
double.label: Analysis Magnification
double.description: The magnification at which the analysis should be performed.

double.name: min_fgnd_frac
double.label: Minimum foreground fraction
double.description: The minimum amount of foreground that must be present in a tile for it to be analyzed

string.name: scheduler
string.label: Scheduler Address
string.description: Address of a dask scheduler in the format '127.0.0.1:8786'. Not passing this parameter sets up a dask cluster on the local machine. 'multiprocessing' uses Python multiprocessing. 'multithreading' uses Python multiprocessing in threaded mode.

integer.name: num_workers
integer.label: Number of workers
integer.description: Number of dask workers to start while setting up a local cluster internally. If a negative value is specified then the number of workers is set to number of cpu cores on the machine minus the number of workers specified.

integer.name: num_threads_per_worker
integer.label: Number of threads per worker
integer.description: Number of threads to use per worker while setting up a local cluster internally. Must be a positive integer >= 1.

integer.name: tile_grouping
integer.label: Tile grouping
integer.description: Number of tiles to process as part of a single task
